A Soviet offensive hand grenade, but with large modifications instead of the usual shrapnel, fragments of electric-type artifacts, which makes this thing a real threat to the inhabitants of the Zone. It is designed for large concentrations of mutants that move quickly, such as: snorks, cats, dogs, wild boars. According to rumors, such a grenade (if you try hard) can shoot down a helicopter. It has a large radius of destruction. Before throwing such a grenade, you need to find shelter!

A Soviet offensive hand grenade, but with large modifications, instead of the usual shrapnel, there are fragments of firearms, which makes this thing a real threat to all residents of the Zone. It is mainly intended for mutants who do not move very fast, such as: zombies, controllers, poltergeists, burers. Its range is less than average. Before throwing such a grenade, you need to find shelter!

It is mainly intended for people who are very well equipped. Causes severe burns and has a radius less than average. Before throwing such a grenade, you need to find shelter!
